languages.text: "Признание не уменьшает вины — за содеянное тебя ждет смерть. Здесь или по возвращению в Администратум после долгого следствия".
"Your confession does nothing to diminish your guilt. You will die for what you did, either here or following your return to the Administratum and a lengthy investigation."
languages.original_text: "Признание не уменьшает вины — за содеянное тебя ждет смерть. Здесь или по возвращению в Администратум после долгого следствия".

traits.locale_text: "Your confession does nothing to diminish your guilt. You will die for what you did. Either here or following your return to the Administratum and a lengthy investigation."
"Your confession does nothing to diminish your guilt. You will die for what you did. Either here or following your return to the Administratum and a lengthy investigation."
"Your confession does nothing to diminish your guilt. You will die for what you did, either here or following your return to the Administratum and a lengthy investigation."
"Your confession does nothing to diminish your guilt. You will die for what you did, either here or following your return to the Administratum and a lengthy investigation."
"Your confession does nothing to diminish your guilt. You will die for what you did, either here or following your return to the Administratum and a lengthy investigation."
"Your confession does nothing to diminish your guilt. You will die for what you did, either here or following your return to the Administratum and a lengthy investigation."

languages.text: «Una confesión no exime tu culpa. Morirás por lo que has hecho, o bien aquí o bien tras tu regreso al Administratum y una extensa investigación».
languages.original_text: "Your confession does nothing to diminish your guilt. You will die for what you did, either here or following your return to the Administratum and a lengthy investigation."

traits.locale_text: «Una confesión no exime tu culpa. Morirás por lo que has hecho, o bien aquí o bien tras tu regreso al Administratum y una extensa investigación».

languages.text: “就算现在认罪，也没办法减刑。你要为你的罪行付出生命的代价，要么即刻执行死刑，要么等你回到内政部，接受漫长的调查之后再执行死刑。”
languages.original_text: "Your confession does nothing to diminish your guilt. You will die for what you did, either here or following your return to the Administratum and a lengthy investigation."

traits.locale_text: “就算现在认罪，也没办法减刑。你要为你的罪行付出生命的代价，要么即刻执行死刑，要么等你回到内政部，接受漫长的调查之后再执行死刑。”

languages.text: 「お前の告白はお前の罪をなくしたりしない。お前がやったことについて、ここで死ぬか、行政局に戻り、長い調査に従うかだ」
languages.original_text: "Your confession does nothing to diminish your guilt. You will die for what you did, either here or following your return to the Administratum and a lengthy investigation."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の告白はお前の罪をなくしたりしない。お前がやったことについて、ここで死ぬか、行政局に戻り、長い調査に従うかだ」

languages.text: « Vos aveux n'atténuent en rien votre culpabilité. Vous allez payer ce crime de votre vie, que ce soit ici et maintenant ou à l'issue d'une longue procédure aux mains de l'Administratum. »
languages.original_text: "Your confession does nothing to diminish your guilt. You will die for what you did, either here or following your return to the Administratum and a lengthy investigation."

traits.locale_text: « Vos aveux n'atténuent en rien votre culpabilité. Vous allez payer ce crime de votre vie, que ce soit ici et maintenant ou à l'issue d'une longue procédure aux mains de l'Administratum. »

languages.text: "İtirafın, suçunu azaltmaz. Yaptığın şey yüzünden öleceksin... Ya burada ya da Administratum'a dönüşünü ve uzun bir soruşturmayı takiben."
languages.original_text: "Your confession does nothing to diminish your guilt. You will die for what you did, either here or following your return to the Administratum and a lengthy investigation."

traits.locale_text: "İtirafın, suçunu azaltmaz. Yaptığın şey yüzünden öleceksin... Ya burada ya da Administratum'a dönüşünü ve uzun bir soruşturmayı takiben."

languages.text: "Euer Geständnis mindert Eure Schuld nicht. Ihr werdet für das, was Ihr getan habt, sterben. Entweder hier oder nach Eurer Rückkehr in das Administratum und nach einem längeren Verhör."
languages.original_text: "Your confession does nothing to diminish your guilt. You will die for what you did, either here or following your return to the Administratum and a lengthy investigation."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Geständnis mindert Eure Schuld nicht. Ihr werdet für das, was Ihr getan habt, sterben. Entweder hier oder nach Eurer Rückkehr in das Administratum und nach einem längeren Verhör."
